attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A person work hard all their life so that they can leave a bit of money to their loved ones when they pass away, why should the government then step in and steal a large chunk of it.
we are greatly taxed all through our living life, please let out loved ones rest in peace knowing their families are provided for.Raising the inheritance tax band to £500.000 will leave the working  families in this country better off.
